content: an accessory for your daily wear all day all night in the whole of seven days all year round do not fret this is so easy to make you can make dozens in a matter of time you can t possibly think of you can easily wash it if it gets dirty then you can wear it over and over again you can make this in different colors to match every outfit you have in your wardrobe or you can wear two different colored bracelets at the same time for that extra spunk
